description.lang: The product is a general purpose Z-Wave remote control. It is battery operated and capable of acting as the primary controller in a system.Fully portable - can be used from any location in the system Can be the system Primary Controller Up to 75m RF range (open field) Can control up to 64 devices in total Can control up to four groups and four scenes Maximum of 64 devices per group or scene Battery-powered Low battery indicator Long battery life, up to two years REMOTE CONTROLSTANDARD CARTON QUANTITY: 1Operating Frequency 868.4 MHzSelect the appropriate 1 Gang or 2 Gang Dimmer Fascia for your Battery Controller Module.Operating Frequency 868.4 MHz
